data.message: Thank you for this amazing act of kindness.  But,I have to ask, Why talk to them through a slanted open window?

replies.message: Our office is in the basement of a local church.  Access to the church is strictly limited to employees of the church and non profits only.  We are thankful to have an office that we are at least able to talk to people and hand out supplies through the window.  It's not ideal but we are in a great location surrounded by many non profits helping the same people.  Thank you for you question.
See, makes sense!  Blessings to you all this Christmas season!
